BR.name: LEGO® Harry Potter™: Years 5-7
BR.description: A batalha está sendo preparada! Baseado nos três últimos livros de Harry Potter e nos quatro últimos filmes, LEGO Harry Potter: Years 5-7 leva os jogadores a aventuras heroicas de Harry Potter no mundo dos trouxas e no dos bruxos. Aprenda e use novos feitiços, incluindo as Maldições Imperdoáveis, e desbloqueie mais de 150 personagens como Fenrir Greyback, Belatriz Lestrange e o Professor Slughorn. Da Rua dos Alfeneiros, em Little Whinging, ao Beco Diagonal, passando por Hogsmead e Hogwarts™, os jogadores encontrarão novos rostos, novos desafios e mais magias, preparando-se para o confronto final contra o Lorde Voldemort™!

CA.name: LEGO® Harry Potter™: Years 5-7
CA.description: The battle is building! Based on the last three Harry Potter books and final four films, LEGO Harry Potter: Years 5-7 takes players through Harry Potter's heroic adventures in the Muggle and wizarding worlds. Learn and use new charms and spells, including the Unforgivable Curses, and unlock over 150 characters, including Fenrir Greyback, Bellatrix Lestrange & Professor Slughorn. From Privet Drive in Little Whinging to Diagon Alley, Hogsmeade and Hogwarts™, players will encounter new faces, new challenges and more magic, preparing them for the ultimate face-off with Lord Voldemort™!

MX.name: LEGO® Harry Potter™: Years 5-7
MX.description: ¡Se arma la batalla! Basado en los últimos tres libros y cuatro películas de Harry Potter, LEGO Harry Potter: Years 5-7 hace vivir a los jugadores las aventuras heroicas de Harry Potter en los mundos Muggle y mágico. Aprende y usa nuevos encantamientos y hechizos, incluyendo las Maldiciones Imperdonables, y descubre más de 150 personajes, incluyendo a Fenrir Greyback, Bellatrix Lestrange y el Profesor Slughorn. Tanto en Privet Drive, en Little Whinging, como en Diagon Alley, Hogsmeade y Hogwarts™, los jugadores encontrarán nuevos rostros, nuevos desafíos y más magia, ¡que los prepararán para la confrontación decisiva con Lord Voldemort™!

US.name: LEGO® Harry Potter™: Years 5-7
US.description: The battle is building! Based on the last three Harry Potter books and final four films, LEGO Harry Potter: Years 5-7 takes players through Harry Potter's heroic adventures in the Muggle and wizarding worlds. Learn and use new charms and spells, including the Unforgivable Curses, and unlock over 150 characters, including Fenrir Greyback, Bellatrix Lestrange & Professor Slughorn. From Privet Drive in Little Whinging to Diagon Alley, Hogsmeade and Hogwarts™, players will encounter new faces, new challenges and more magic, preparing them for the ultimate face-off with Lord Voldemort™!
